00021 #ifndef PLATFORMENGINE_H
00022 #define PLATFORMENGINE_H
00023 
00024 #include <stack>
00025 
00026 #include "SDL.h"
00027 
00028 // Forward reference to GameState class.
00029 class GameState;
00030 
00031 using std::stack;
00032 
00033 /**********************************************************/
00040 class PlatformEngine {
00041         public:
00042                 PlatformEngine();
00043                 
00044                 //** Prepares engine subsystems and assets
00045                 void Init();
00046 
00047                 //** Clears up any engine assets before the program ends.
00048                 void Cleanup();
00049 
00050                 //** Loads the initial engine state from the script
00051                 void StartState();
00052                 
00053                 //** Explicitly changes the state of the engine.
00054                 void ChangeState( GameState* state );
00055                 
00056                 //** Puts a new state onto the engine state stack.
00057                 void PushState( GameState* state, char* scriptPath = NULL );
00058 
00059                 //** Ends the top state on the engine stack.
00060                 void PopState();
00061                 
00062                 //** Processes user input events.
00063                 void HandleEvents();
00064 
00065                 //** Brings the game logic up-to-date.
00066                 void Update();
00067 
00068                 //** Draws necessary surfaces to the screen.
00069                 void Draw();
00070                 
00071                 //** Returns whether or not the game loop is running.
00072                 bool Running() { return running; }
00073 
00074                 //** Halts the game loop.
00075                 void Quit() { running = false; }
00076 
00077         private:
00078                 //** Stack of game states. The top state is the active one.
00079                 stack< GameState* > stateStack;
00080                 
00081                 //** The primary SDL_Surface that images are drawn to.
00082                 SDL_Surface* mainScreen;
00083                 
00084                 //** Controls whether or not the game loop is active.
00085                 bool running;
00086                 
00087                 //** The complete title of the game; used in window header
00088                 char* fullTitle;
00089 };
00090 
00091 #endif
